column4: Hey... I installed Hardy on a school computer, but it has a crappy connection and I can't apt-get update and install stuff..
I need to get the things I need install from a livecd at home..
Just put a cd in the computer with the packages on it and you can run synaptic to install... you can build a custom set of packages using aptoncd
I am not sure how to help you with that, try the forums
